metadata.synopsis: Toobin remarks on the Lab room when he enters it as your follower.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"turn on peace modeGo to -1982; -1; 420observe the AD play

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: This is the Foundry's main lab. The horrors we made here will haunt me to the grave.
